basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A highly skilled and versatile Software Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, proficient in full-stack development, AI/Machine Learning, and DevOps practices. Passionate about building robust, scalable applications from conception to deployment.

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small development team to build the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript.
highlights: Functioned as the primary front-end developer and a contributing back-end developer, responsible for architecting and developing key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility, delivering a seamless user experience across all devices
Worked closely with the back-end team on system design and API integration to ensure smooth data flow and application functionality

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend development projects and engineered AI-powered solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams.
highlights: Led the frontend refactoring of an exam management platform (examene.umfst.ro/login) using Vue.js and Vuetify, improving user experience and page load times by approximately 25%
Engineered and deployed an AI-powered browser extension (AdCognition) using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time ad detection and blocking
Developed RoboGPT, an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands using LLMs and OpenAI APIs
Actively engaged in code reviews and collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate complex mockups into functional web pages

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing innovative automation solutions.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide Innovation contest by developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, significantly improving team efficiency
Honed communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills while interacting with customers from diverse cultures

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: A full-stack social media application built with the MERN stack, demonstrating an understanding of end-to-end web development.
highlights: Designed and developed IT-Hub with a strong focus on building dynamic frontend features using React.js
Built all UI features using a component-based architecture and effectively managed application state using Redux

projects.name: Otis â€“ Customer Support Automation Tool
projects.description: An internal tool that won a company innovation award, using JavaScript, jQuery, and RegEx to automate form-filling and email generation for customer support.

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: A Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms Micropython robot from university, demonstrating experience with robotics, sensors, and OOP principles.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: An AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking.

projects.name: RoboGPT

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
